Description
Embarcadero Ice Skating and Building Lighting Ceremony. Building Lighting Ceremony. The Ceremony takes place at the Holiday Ice Rink in Embarcadero Center and will include a performance by SF Jazz All Star High School Ensemble, an ice show, a special guest performance and a spectacular pyrotechnic show dazzling the City&#8217;s skyline. Embarcadero Center&#8217;s dramatic office tower will illuminate San Francisco&#8217;s skyline with 17,000 lights.  Location: Justin Herman Plaza, San Francisco, CA 94111. Time: 5:45 PM to 7:00 PM. embarcaderocenter.com
